product_name: The North Face B Triclimate Jacket - Women's
long_description: Enjoy 3-in-1 versatility on your urban treks in The North Face B Triclimate jacket. Its waterproof shell and liner jacket insulated with PrimaLoft(R) Eco can be worn separately or together. Waterproof, breathable, fully seam-sealed outer jacket is made of polyester HyVent(R) 2-layer nylon. Outer jacket features empire-waist styling and center-front zipper with snap placket. Removable liner jacket features a quilted body, empire waist and 2 zippered hand pockets. Outer jacket has adjustable, removable hood; bubble cuffs and hem. The North Face B Triclimate jacket for women also features welted zippered hand pockets; Napoleon pocket with inner media port and cord guide; metal logo rivet at bicep.
short_description: Enjoy 3-in-1 versatility on your urban treks in The North Face B Triclimate jacket. Its waterproof shell and liner jacket insulated with PrimaLoft(R) Eco can be worn separately or together.
